dataManagers

Class ClaimListManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • dataManagers.ClaimListManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ApproverClaimListManager, ClaimantClaimListManager

    public abstract class ClaimListManager
extends Object
    ClaimListManager is the abstract base class for connecting to the webserver which allow the application to serialize and load user claims onto the claims list A ClaimListManager object encapsulates the state information needed for the various online/offline loading operations that app supports. This state information includes:
    • The application context
    • The current claims list
    • The resource url of the elastic web server
    • The search url of the server
    • Bool of whether the claims have been registered to the gson adapter

    Since:
    1.0
